results.title: Two decades
results.creator_credit: Films Division, Government of India and N.V.K. Murty
results.brief_description: The history of India since the end of British Colonial rule, and the beginning of the end of colonial rule all over the world. Highlights are the passing of great men; the achievement of internal unity in spite of religious and class differences. Five year plans have changed the face of India but much remains to be achieved.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Films Division, Government of India and N.V.K. Murty

results.title: Two cities: London and New York
results.creator_credit: John H Secondari Productions, Learning Corporation of America, John H. Secondari and Helen Jean Secondari
results.brief_description: A comparison of the quality of life and approach to urban problems of two western English speaking capital cities. Varied in their ethnic make up, cultural traditions, physical layout and community organisation, London and New York offer very different advantages and problems.
results.creator_credit_for_label: John H Secondari Productions, Learning Corporation of America, John H. Secondari and Helen Jean Secondari

results.title: Two Chinese dancers
results.creator_credit: Chinese Film Enterprises of America and Wan-go Wen
results.brief_description: Miss Tai Ai-Lien presents two traditional Chinese folk dances, the Yao ceremonial prelude which is used at marriages and funerals, and a solo dance drama called ‘The Mute and the Cripple’. There is no dialogue or commentary, these presentations of little-known Chinese dances are accompanied by authentic folk music played on flute and drums.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Chinese Film Enterprises of America and Wan-go Wen

results.title: Two brothers in Greece
results.brief_description: Looks at two Greek brothers, one who remains in the village of Peloponnesus to continue farming, thus helping his brother financially as he goes to engineering school, while the other runs a tourist boat through the Greek Isles.

results.title: Two boys and a boat
results.creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Shan Benson and Richard Mason
results.brief_description: The story of how two boys acquire a V.J. sailing boat by joining a club on the shores of Sydney Harbour and the way in which they are taught to sail their craft in safety.

results.title: Two bob mermaid
results.creator_credit: Core Films, Antonia Barnard and Darlene Johnson
results.brief_description: In this visually stunning short film set in the 1950s, a fair-skinned Aboriginal girl gains access to the local swimming pool where Aboriginal people are legally denied access (Source: Australian Screen)

results.title: Two blades of grass [excerpt]
results.creator_credit: CSIRO. Film Unit and S.T. Evans
results.brief_description: Develops the theme that Australia’s agricultural future could depend on the use of a properly fertilised legume. The role of the legume nodule in this respect and in opening up new areas is stressed. Excerpt from Title 011252.
results.description: Develops the theme that Australia’s agricultural future could depend on the use of a properly fertilised legume. The role of the legume nodule in this respect and in opening up new areas is stressed. Excerpt from Title 011252.

results.title: Two bagatelles
results.creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Norman McLaren and Grant Munro
results.brief_description: Two short Norman McLaren films in which animation technique is employed with live actors. In the first, entitled On the Lawn, a male dancer waltzes to synthetic music. The second is a fast march, In the Backyard, accompanied by an old-fashioned calliope.

results.title: Two Australias
results.creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development and Diane O'Connor
